name: Sombrio Cadence Mid Shorts - Women's
description: For long days in the saddlle. With a premium chamois, these shorts add extra comfort for epic days on the trail. And, they're super breathable and stretchy.Wide bands at waist and thigh reduce slippage during your ride.Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility.Female-specific Elevation Plus chamois improves comfort in the saddle.Low-profile triple density padding has strategically placed ultra-high-density foam where it is needed most.Flat stitching reduces chaffing.Base layer fit.
